resources.string: Sorry, this account has been bound with Zhongjun card. Please switch to other accounts
Card number verification is in progress.\n\tPlease wait patiently...
Card activation in progress \ nPlease wait patiently
Entering number selection \ nPlease wait patiently
SIM card recognition is abnormal. \nPlease replace the card slot and try again
Zhongjun communication handheld business hall serves you
Please enter the 6-digit service password (the last 6 digits of your ID card)
The mobile number format is incorrect \nPlease enter the correct mobile number

1. If the number has been in arrears and stopped, please check the amount of arrears, so as to prevent you from using it normally due to insufficient recharge amount. \n2. Please fill in the mobile phone number that needs to be recharged accurately. After the recharge is successful, the call fee cannot be refunded. \n3. Dear users, we will recharge you at the operator according to the platform service fee you pay. The arrival time may be slightly delayed. Please wait patiently. If you have any questions, please call customer service.
Dear customer, the card adaptation package is as follows

1. Customers of 2/3g unlimited package and 4G king of heart package must cancel the 2/3g unlimited package and 4G king of heart package before handling the above tariff packages (for details, please inquire 10086). After handling the new package, the suspended old package cannot be restored. 
2. The traffic contained in the above package is domestic general traffic (excluding Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan), which can be shared with universal sub card or aurora broadband sub number; The voice included is the number of minutes of domestic voice calls (excluding videophone), and the package is free of charge for caller ID function. 
3. Broadband and 4K TV services included in the package need to be handled separately. ① Handle broadband: directly click here to handle > >; ② Notice for broadband users: if you have handled home broadband service, please adjust the broadband rate in the service hall before the end of the month after the package is changed; 
4. Please download and login the 40g and color cloud space rights (20g personal cloud + 20g home cloud) contained in the package and use it with the color cloud client.
1. The prepaid fee is the card opening and recharging fee of the current month; \N2. The accounting method is to recharge the balance according to the remaining days of the month;
I have read and agree to the above details
Please read the instructions and click "I have read and agree with the above details"
Sorry \n recharge payment failed, please try again
Hi ~ welcome to Zhongjun communication handheld business hall \n log in now and experience more functions
Hello, your card number%s has been activated successfully. For more business processing, please call 4008631678 or log in to Zhongjun wallet app: dwz.cn/zxsnaxdf.
Activation failed, please contact the mobile phone manufacturer!

1. After the card is successfully opened, we will notify you by SMS; \n2. If your card number has not been used normally after activation, please try to restart your mobile phone; \n3. If you have any other questions, please contact the customer service hotline: 4008631678
